```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(gganimate)
```

```{r}
#read in data
mono_lake <- read_csv(here("data", "mono_lake_annual_levels.csv"), skip = 5)
```

```{r}
# simplify dataset, rename some varibales 
mono_levels <- mono_lake %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename(level = lake_level_feet_above_sea_level)
 
  

```

```{r}
# Data Vis here
ggplot(mono_levels, aes(x = year, y = level))+
  geom_line(size = .7)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(
    x = "Year",
    y = "Lake Level (ft Above Sealevel)",
    title = "Level of Mono Lake",
    subtitle = "1850 - 2017"
  )+
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        panel.border = element_blank())+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 6350, size = 1, alpha = 0.5, color = "firebrick")+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 6360, size = 1, alpha = 0.5,color = "tomato")+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 6377, size = 1, alpha = 0.5,color = "orange")+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 6392, size = 1, alpha = 0.5,color = "deepskyblue4")+
  annotate(geom="text", x= 1862, y= 6394, size = 3.5, 
           label="Target level (6392 ft)")+
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 1868, y = 6379, size = 3.5,
          label = "Land bridge forms (6377 ft)")+
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 1872, y = 6362, size = 3.5,
           label = "Adverse salinity effects (6360 ft)")+
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 1877, y = 6352, size = 3.5,
           label = "Acute adverse salinity effects (6350 ft)")+
  transition_reveal(year)
  
  
  

```
